E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Ronald Petrone
Dear Sir,
Ronald Petrone isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .228, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Richard Beckford
Dear Sir,
Richard Beckford has an ERA of 5.34 at AA Patriot Games.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Subject: Thomas Joplin is sick...
Diagnosis: Stomach Flu.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Saturday, 5/10/1990
Subject: Status of George Cannon
Dear Sir,
George Cannon shouldn't play at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .248 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 5/29/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
William Parker



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1990
Subject: I am a starter...

Regards,
David Hawkin
